name: Strawberry
description: Strawberry is a low-growing, perennial plant that produces sweet, juicy, and vibrant red fruits. Known for its rich vitamin C content and antioxidants, it is widely cultivated for its edible fruit, which is used fresh or in jams, desserts, and beverages.

environmental_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained, loamy or sandy soil rich in organic matter
environmental_requirements.watering_frequency: Regular, keeping soil moist but not waterlogged

cultivation_info.planting_season: Spring or autumn, depending on climate
